pullRequest.title: change minimum supported Android version to 4.2
pullRequest.bodyText:
follow-up to #4779
Bumping min. Android version from 4.1 to 4.2
This should have had happened for v3.11.0 which is already in RC phase, so making sure it happens for 3.12 at least.

nodes.bodyText: This is now always shown, or? So we can change it in xml and remove this line.

commit.message:
change minimum supported Android version to 4.2

Signed-off-by: Andy Scherzinger <info@andy-scherzinger.de>
